messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

users have access to new security groups hello we go for call resolve issue kind regards engineer en sent tuesday re add users can you please advise ticket number for above reference closed thanks sent re add users hi there we have tried these links again unfortunately we still cannot access them can someone try investigate further please we require for our role coordinator ext en sent add users hello please be advised you have added also member please allow up hours for changes take effect if you encounter any further issues please get back thank you kind regards analyst ext hub sent tuesday re add users hi logged we never received any re reference number very urgent we have upload monthly figures etc marked closed complete but we still have access any relevant folders thanks sent re add users hi guys still working please ca you also add thank you leader en sent friday re add users hi there have checked again afraid still cannot access links below thanks coordinator ext en sent re add users hi made some changes permissions give few minutes then try again please thank you leader en sent thursday re add users hi afraid we still cannot access some links we previously had access following some examples layouts source layouts source administration administration type item name thanks coordinator ext en sent re add users hi guys you added check your access let know if there still any issues left kind regards leader en sent thursday re add users hello please be advised have added below ladies kind regards analyst ext hub sent thursday re add users hi request include them was approved please can you add them separately thank you leader en sent thursday re add users hello respect below request can add aforementioned members but if you below screen you notice there only there users present included there for simplification purposes can add them there kind regards analyst ext hub sent wednesday re add users approved sent re add users hi yes please change ownership we also have your approval for be included thank you leader en sent wednesday re add users hi approved please also change ownership thanks sent add users hello we have your approval add below mentioned users kind regards analyst ext hub sent wednesday add users hi guys please can you add following groups can have necessary access added for their approval if necessary thanks kind regards leader en
